H0.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Belgians

H1.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Francophones

H2.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Belgae

H3.text: What are the French speaking citizens of Belgium called. Walons

A4.text: Walloons (WOL-oonz; French: Wallons [walɔ̃] ; Walloon: Walons) are a Gallo-Romance ethnic group native to Wallonia, Belgium. Walloons primarily speak langues d'oïl such as Belgian French, Picard and Walloon.

A5.text: The historian Louis Dewez underlined that 'Belgium is shared into two people, Walloons and Flemings. The former are speaking French, the latter are speaking Flemish.'
